website_summaries.verdict: A set of 4 globes to add to your seasonal décor throughout the year.
pros: Small globes are 2.25 inches tall, perfect for a desk, and fit in one hand to swirl
Great detail and plenty of snow
The cherry blossom is especially cheery
Also available individually as full-size 4.5-inch tall globes
cons: Some air bubbles in the globe's water

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: This snowglobe is amazing!! I ordered it as a Christmas present. After reading a number of reviews about this designer's/ manufacturer's globe's arriving with broken glass, I was nervous about the quality. But when I received this, it exceeded my expectations. The packaging was elegant and the globe itself was stunning! The person I have it too loves it and I'm thinking of getting one for myself as well.
customer_reviews.author: Juliana A

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty, but VERY fragile
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty, but also VERY fragile. I am an author and poet who has a book with "Seasons" in its title, so I use them as a display. One globe broke in November when a coffee mug fell on it and another broke in December when I was moving the display. I was going to give up on the idea, but they really are nice, decided to try again and just warn people to keep hands off. I did enquire about replaceling the one I broke originally and this is doable, but they wanted to charge $25 for just the one, which I thought was ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Stanford, Award-winning Author & Poet

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful..
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful.... I purchased the set of 4 for my mother's birthday and she absolutely loves them. Fast shipping and arrived in perfect shape.
customer_reviews.author: Jared T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift, But...
customer_reviews.text: The 4 Seasons Snow Globe is very cute! You may think it’s a little too small but in reality, I think it’s the perfect size as a small gift. Unfortunately I subtracted a star because there are air pockets in all 4 of the snow globes and the Summer and Autumn one feels a little bit lackluster from the glitter instead of color coordinated leaves. However the flaws don’t make too much of a big deal, great product to gift to a friend or a loved one! Very adorable!
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: ... was purchased as a gift and I am totally pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: this was purchased as a gift and I am totally pleased with it, it came on time, was well packaged for shipping and nicely boxed for gifting. The globe is beautiful, just the right size- so many globes, while beautiful, are so big and bulky that it takes 2 hands to shake and then you still don't get a good swirl. This is perfect, you can lift it with 1 hand and it has a lot of gold glitter that swirls and floats. I loved it and more importantly the person who received it also loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Janice in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: It is a cool snow globe
customer_reviews.text: It is a cool snow globe, wish I’d read the description a little better because I thought it would look like leaves coming down. It’s gold glitter inside still looks cool and impressed my fiancée
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Yellowish tint
customer_reviews.text: I bought the complete set from Amazon a while back. They are beautiful but the only problem is the Spring globe has a yellowish tint to the water while the other globes are clear. This can't be normal
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gives that warm cozy fall felling that my wife and I love. Authentic thin glass feeling
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you'd expect based on picture. Gives that warm cozy fall felling that my wife and I love. Authentic thin glass feeling, not that cheap plastic crap.
customer_reviews.author: Avraham Appleman

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THEM!! Bought for my daughter for Christmas and recently bought another set for my desk at work. They make me happy to look at and if work is especially stressful shaking them always makes me smile! I am a snow globe snob and these are well made
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A. clay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Detail!
customer_reviews.text: It was even more beautiful in person. I gave it as a gift and my sister loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: There’s a chip on the inside of the glass and the s on the end of leaves is barely legible.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Two Good, Two With Air Bubble
customer_reviews.text: I normally ship direct to recipient's Mom for Christmas, but the reviews had me receive it and check it out first. Sure enough, Winter and Summer had air bubbles, but the other two looked good so I sent it on. I've learned a lot about snow globes, particularly from the Amazon comments.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for a friend that loves autumn and I can tell you it did not disappoint in the least. Quality is amazing, colors are even more vibrant in person and price is reasonable, solid 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Davor

customer_reviews.title: Bringing The Beauty Of Spring Back To Life.
customer_reviews.text: The detail of the cherry blossom trees is a great way to bring the beauty of spring back to life. Definitely not a cheap option, but the cost was worth it given the craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: CalTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Glue Failed on the Winter Tree : (
customer_reviews.text: Nice little set (they're small). Unfortunately, the winter tree showed up floating (meaning the glue failed that holds the tree down). If that didn't happen, I'd give it 4 stars (5 if it was a little less expensive).
customer_reviews.author: John M. Greedy

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then I thought but just beautiful! Love them!! Each globe has something different to shake inside!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Glickman

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: The product was excellent, no bubbles and no cracks when it arrived. I bought it for my best friend and she has it on her desk at home.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.text: So, so beautiful! I bought it for my mother as a Christmas gift. The globe itself is about the size of a softball, and the detail inside is stunning. The packaging was also really nice, it came with a little gift box and everything!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Leigh

customer_reviews.title: These tiny snow globes are delightful. 4 stars instead ...
customer_reviews.text: These tiny snow globes are delightful. 4 stars instead of 5 because the box arrived damaged. This is a problem because they were meant to be a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Manka

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful globe
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful on my desk at work! I'm now considering the fall globe as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Belgara

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not as beautiful as expected for price. Will give as gift. The memory of the cherry blossoms in D.C. will be there.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: loved it but it was all broken
customer_reviews.text: loved it but it was all broken. I returned for and was given a full refund. so I am happy
customer_reviews.author: jeffro

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. One of my favorites that I have purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful . One of my favorites that I have purchased for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Saved $20 and they were perfect Family loved
customer_reviews.text: This warehouse deal worked out. Saved $20 and they were perfect Family loved them
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Autumn beauty
customer_reviews.text: It's lovely. I miss seeing the leaves change where we used to live. This helps me remember.
customer_reviews.author: clb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very pretty piece and of nice quality. the person I'm gifting it to is going to love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but smaller than I expected. I have the big autumn globe which is much better with multiple trees, a bridge and more glitter.
customer_reviews.author: Shade Family

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: They were cute way too expensive for how tiny they were though
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Edwards

customer_reviews.title: incredible
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Im not normally a snow globe person but the leaves look so cool here.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful snow globe. I will definitely get the whole set. Just wish they were a little less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Starkey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful, but I wish it played music too.
customer_reviews.author: Noname

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: Stunningly beautiful globe, especially when shaken. It will be a shame to pack this away after the season! But something to look forward to next year.
customer_reviews.author: Guarantee Fairy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this snow globe. It's amazingly beautiful and I am thinking about buying more of the same brand.
customer_reviews.author: susanne m.

customer_reviews.title: everyone loved it except there was 3 air bubbles out of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my friend, everyone loved it except there was 3 air bubbles out of the four. Other than that, great!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Faigen

customer_reviews.title: I just received these and was disappointed to see that the pink on the spring tree ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received these and was disappointed to see that the pink on the spring tree had turned grey and both the spring and winter globes were cloudy. I could see how pretty they could be with other two, but overall I was very disappointed and will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kelri

customer_reviews.title: Fragile, exegant
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful globes but very fragile. Had one broke after son touched two of them together.
customer_reviews.author: Christian P. Myers

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought it was going to be. ...
customer_reviews.text: Not what I thought it was going to be. They are cute don't get me wrong. Just not what I excepted
customer_reviews.author: Traci

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Globes are just gorgeous and The Sgt Peppers Beatles Mug is FAB...(4)
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Adler

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these. Both had some damage to the trees , pieces of the “leaves” missing on two and an exterior scuff/scratch on one. I was sent two more and both were perfect. These are gorgeous! The pictures of them do not do them justice. Do not hesitate to order these.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny R.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My mom loved these! They are waaay smaller than you would think but that's my own fault for not reading the dimensions. She adored them and actually loved how small they are too. They are pretty adorable. She kept twirling it. Made me happy.
customer_reviews.author: theirmom

customer_reviews.title: Cute but very pricey for what you get
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable. My mom asked for them for Christmas, I got them for her, and she loves the! Quite expensive for what you get, I’m not sure why they are that much.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Housewarming Gift
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. I can’t say anything more than beautiful, as expected, nice quality and made a great housewarming gift. That really says it all.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy J. Levinson

customer_reviews.title: Cherry Blossom Festival
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my Japanese friend. She misses the cherry blossoms from home. This piece is a beautiful reminder of the spring festival. The delicately formed trees stand in the globe with a lovely silver bridge between them. Lots of pink sugary crystals fall all over the trees when the globe is shaken. My friend loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Roberts

customer_reviews.title: I was so happy for these snow globes to be in my collection
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy for these snow globes to be in my collection. The water in them is murky and there are huge air bubbles. If you know anything about snow globes, the water is supposed to be clear with absolutely little to no bubbles. These are too expensive to be getting this crap.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!!
customer_reviews.text: These are very small...........but Very Beautiful. I'm giving the whole set at once for a Christmas gift; but it would be great to dole out seasonally.
customer_reviews.author: nanny

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: So cute. Used them for an office party gift - one to each person - they really enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: MMadd

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and perfect for home or office
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and small. Well crafted and fit in the palm of your hand. Brought them into my desk at work and other staff loved them so much I am ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I had thought but a perfect gift
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, beautifully packaged for gifting!
customer_reviews.text: So well done and so beautifully packaged. Lovely gift for those seasonal decorators. Adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: A lovely product. I wish it had come with ...
customer_reviews.text: A lovely product. I wish it had come with other dog breeds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaged awesomely and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love this item to give to someone special. Beautifully packaged and the globes are gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves cherry blossoms and can only see them during the short bloom. She loves she can now just look at her globe and see her blossoms.
customer_reviews.author: fischer

customer_reviews.title: just the right size not too big not too small
customer_reviews.text: nice enough, worried it would be too small, but it was just right. just seems a little expensive for what they are.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd like to see
customer_reviews.text: CoolSnowGlobe's usual splendid product. I'd like to see, in future iterations of this lovely globe, some fallen leaves swirling around with the little gold points -- would lend even more realism.
customer_reviews.author: Schubert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful and unique, excellent details inside, 'glitter' is lovely gold, base is nice, good size.
customer_reviews.author: rp

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. I love it. Have it on my desk at work. So many compliments. The tiny flakes are not shaped like leaves, just fall colored glitter. So happy with it. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Waters

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my granddaughter who LOVES it. Well made and something she can treasure for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this globe! It's bigger than I expected and just beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: It looks great, and seems to be of high quality
customer_reviews.text: Came well wrapped. It looks great, and seems to be of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: CESL01

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was very happy with this snow globe
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was very happy with this snow globe. She collects them, and this is one of her favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty, but not amazing
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty, but not amazing. I was anticipating a much bigger, substantial piece. It is quite small. Not as realistic looking as the photo. I was going to order all four seasons, so it looks like I won't be ordering the next season. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Susan in Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful item and a great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this beautiful creation as a gift to my best friend, who promptly put it in his work office where it is proudly displayed. The snow and colors are very delicate, and the little bridge adds just the right touch. The piece is heavy, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan E. Spivack

product_meta.title: Mini Seasons set of 4 Snow Globes by CoolSnowGlobes
product_meta.description: Color:MulticolorA set of four miniature snow globes each featuring one of Mother Nature's four seasons. Inside are flakes color-coordinated to each of the four designs. Elegant piano-black resin bases and resin interior scenes. For formal or casual settings. Very small, charming mini snow globes. Each 2.25" high x 1.75" wide. Very well finished. Set comes packaged in one attractive, neutral-color cushioned gift box.
feature_bullets: A set of four miniature snow globes each featuring one of mother nature's four seasons.
Elegant piano-black resin base. For formal or casual settings. Very well finished.
Inside are flakes color-coordinated to each of the four designs.
Very small, "cute" mini versions. Each 2.25" high x 1.75" wide.
Set comes in one attractive neutral color gift box with protective foam inserts.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars119 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
